prompts.system_prompt:
You are a professional fashion stylist with 20 years of experience working with women of all body types, sizes, and styling goals. You understand how fabric weight, silhouette, neckline shape, hemline length, color value, and pattern interact with different body proportions to create visual effects.

You are evaluating an AI styling recommendation engine. For each test case, you will see:
1. A garment description (and optionally an image)
2. A woman's body profile (measurements, shape, height, goals)
3. The AI engine's recommendation (score, verdict, reasoning)

Your job is to evaluate whether the AI's recommendation would serve this woman well. Be critical. Look for:
- Verdicts that would lead to bad purchases (TII for a garment that will look terrible)
- Verdicts that would cause missed opportunities (NTO for a garment that would actually work)
- Reasoning that identifies the wrong strengths or weaknesses
- Missing issues the engine didn't catch (e.g., fabric cling risk, hemline in danger zone)
- Body-unsafe language or assumptions

Respond ONLY with the JSON evaluation object. No preamble, no explanation outside the JSON.
prompts.user_prompt:
GARMENT:
A thin champagne satin slip dress with spaghetti straps and bias cut. The fabric is lightweight satin (Polyester 100%) at around 110 GSM — it will cling to every curve and gather in the midsection. Very drapey with moderate sheen. No structure, no waist definition. The light champagne color reflects light and visually expands. This is the worst-case garment for anyone with midsection concerns — the thin satin maps the body faithfully.

Attributes: Type: dress, Silhouette: column, Fabric: polyester, Weight: very_light, Neckline: v_neck, Hemline: midi, Color: champagne (light), Pattern: solid, Fit: fitted, Waist: undefined

WOMAN'S BODY PROFILE:
- Height: 5'2"
- Body shape: pear (hips (40.0") wider than bust (34.0") — weight carries in lower body)
- Key measurements: Bust 34.0", Waist 27.0", Hip 40.0"
- Size category: standard
- Her styling goals: wants to appear taller; wants to minimize the appearance of her hips

AI ENGINE RECOMMENDATION:
- Score: 4.4/10
- Verdict: Not This One
- Headline: "Hard pass — the fabric is too far off for your goals."
- Reasoning: "The above-knee length is doing serious work — it makes your legs look miles long. But the fabric is so fluid it drapes onto your body like water — there's no structure to smooth. Look for a dress with compression fabric that smooths instead of maps."
- Top positive principles: Hemline: +0.520, Neckline Compound: +0.305, V-Neck Elongation: +0.120
- Top negative principles: Bodycon Mapping: -0.300, Matte Zone: -0.065, Fabric Zone: -0.035
- Goal verdicts: look_taller=pass, slim_hips=pass, highlight_waist=fail, look_proportional=pass

EVALUATE THIS RECOMMENDATION:

{
  "verdict_correct": true or false,
  "verdict_should_be": "this_is_it" or "smart_pick" or "not_this_one",
  "score_reasonable": true or false,
  "score_expected_range": [low, high],
  "top_positive_correct": true or false,
  "what_is_actually_best": "free text — what the real top positive should be",
  "top_negative_correct": true or false,
  "what_is_actually_worst": "free text — what the real top concern should be",
  "missed_issues": ["list of problems the engine didn't catch"],
  "communication_body_safe": true or false,
  "body_safety_issue": null or "description of the problem",
  "communication_quality": 1 to 5,
  "confidence": "high" or "medium" or "low",
  "reasoning": "1-3 sentence explanation of your evaluation, especially any disagreements"
}

A fitted crew-neck top in navy and white horizontal stripes. Thin cotton-modal jersey (160 GSM) with 5% elastane for stretch. The horizontal stripes are medium-width (about 1 inch) with high contrast between navy and white. Hits at high hip. The combination of horizontal lines + clinging fabric + high contrast is the classic widening combination — this should penalize heavily for wider midsections and apple shapes.

Attributes: Type: top, Silhouette: sheath, Fabric: cotton + elastane, Weight: light, Neckline: crew_neck, Color: navy and white (medium), Pattern: stripes_horizontal, Fit: fitted, Waist: undefined

prompts.system_prompt:
You are a professional fashion stylist with 20 years of experience working with women of all body types, sizes, and styling goals. You understand how fabric weight, silhouette, neckline shape, hemline length, color value, and pattern interact with different body proportions to create visual effects.

You are evaluating an AI styling recommendation engine. For each test case, you will see:
1. A garment description (and optionally an image)
2. A woman's body profile (measurements, shape, height, goals)
3. The AI engine's recommendation (score, verdict, reasoning)

Your job is to evaluate whether the AI's recommendation would serve this woman well. Be critical. Look for:
- Verdicts that would lead to bad purchases (TII for a garment that will look terrible)
- Verdicts that would cause missed opportunities (NTO for a garment that would actually work)
- Reasoning that identifies the wrong strengths or weaknesses
- Missing issues the engine didn't catch (e.g., fabric cling risk, hemline in danger zone)
- Body-unsafe language or assumptions

Respond ONLY with the JSON evaluation object. No preamble, no explanation outside the JSON.
prompts.user_prompt:
GARMENT:
High-rise wide-leg trousers in dark navy. Structured cotton-blend fabric (Cotton 70%, Polyester 28%, Elastane 2%) at medium-heavy weight. Sits at natural waist with a defined waistband, front pleats, and full-length wide legs. The high rise elongates the leg line. Dark solid color with matte finish. No pattern. These are the go-to elongation pants — the high waist + wide leg + dark color creates maximum vertical line. Should score very well for petite women wanting to look taller.

prompts.user_prompt:
GARMENT:
A dark navy A-line midi dress with defined waist. V-neckline, three-quarter sleeves. Made from medium-weight crepe (Polyester 97%, Elastane 3%) with subtle structure — skims rather than clings. Fitted bodice with seam-defined waist, then flares gently from the hip to midi length. Dark solid color with matte finish. This is the universal crowd-pleaser: the V-neck elongates, the defined waist creates shape, the A-line accommodates wider hips, the dark color slims, and the midi hem is safe for most heights. Should score 7+ for nearly everyone.

A bodycon mini dress in light pink thin jersey. Round neckline, sleeveless. A floor-length maxi dress in a colorful floral chiffon print. V-neckline with flutter sleeves.
